Burning Hammer walks in the room.

Burning Hammer: Hmm. That tunnel lead back into this room. Hi, who're you?

Burning Hammer was speaking to Aerotaur. Perplex laughs but then gasps.

Perplex: I forgot about The Hero.

Perplex runs out and picks him up, putting his head back on. The Hero
instantly wakes up.

The Hero: Dumb ass! Never leave your savior behind!

Perplex: Savior?...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Rudra656@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, March 26, 2001 7:09 PM
Subject: Re: Angel Prime meets Nightlight


> ::Aerotaur::
>     "No worries.  I just took a little shot to the head.  I feel as good
as
> new.  My head still hurts a bit, but I'll be fine."  His right eye starts
to
> twitch.  "And apparently I've developed a twitch."  He begins laughing at
his
> own absurdities.
